text: Roberto Fernando Frojuelo (born November 8, 1937 in São Paulo, Brazil), known as Roberto Fernando, is a former Brazilian footballer who played for clubs in Brazil, Argentina and Chile. ==Teams== * São Paulo 1956 * Guarani 1957-1958 * São Paulo 1959-1960 * River Plate 1961-1963Duchini, Alejandro (2010) "Historias escritas desde la pobreza", Notio.com.ar, 19 December 2010, retrieved 2011-07-12 * Colo-Colo 1964-1965 * Palmeiras 1966 ==References== ==External links== * Roberto Fernando Frojuello at Mamvs.Narod * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazil international footballers Category:São Paulo FC players Category:Club Atlético River Plate footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Roberto Fernando Frojuelo
